{
    "count": 5,

    "results": [
        {
            "id": 5,
            "title": "Core and Abs Sculpting",
            "description": "Targeted core workout featuring planks, Russian twists, leg raises, and bicycle crunches. Build a strong, defined midsection while improving overall stability and posture in just 20 minutes.",
            "created_by": 19,
            "created_by_name": "David Martinez",
            "gym_branch": 2,
            "gym_branch_name": "Location 2",
            "is_active": true,
            "created_at": "2026-01-15T17:23:26.842183+06:00"
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "title": "Powerlifting Program - 12 Weeks",
            "description": "Structured 12-week powerlifting program focused on increasing your squat, bench press, and deadlift maxes. Includes progressive overload, deload weeks, and accessory work for optimal strength gains.",
            "created_by": 19,
            "created_by_name": "David Martinez",
            "gym_branch": 2,
            "gym_branch_name": "Location 2",
            "is_active": false,
            "created_at": "2026-01-15T17:23:18.660228+06:00"

            "is_active": true,
            "created_at": "2026-01-15T17:23:01.885760+06:00"

        {

        {

            "title": "Beginner Full Body Strength",
            "description": "A comprehensive full-body workout designed for beginners focusing on compound movements. Includes squats, deadlifts, bench press, and rows. Perfect for building foundational strength and muscle mass.",
